doctitle.textblock: General Management Plan/Environmental Impact Statement for Fort Clatsop National Memorial, OR

action.textblock: Notice of extension of public review period.

summary.textblock: contained a notice by the National Park Service that announced the availability of the draft General Management Plan/Environmental Impact Statement (GMP/EIS) for Fort Clatsop National Memorial, Oregon, and called for written comments to be submitted by January 7, 1994. This present notice announces a 31-day extension of the period available for public review of the draft GMP/EIS.

date.textblock: Comments on the draft GMP/EIS should be received no later than February 7, 1994.

address.textblock: Written comments on the draft GMP/EIS should be submitted to the Superintendent, Fort Clatsop National Memorial, Route 3, Box 604-FC, Astoria, Oregon 97103.

further.textblock: Superintendent, Fort Clatsop National Memorial, at the above address or at telephone number (503) 861-2471.

signjob.textblock: Deputy Regional Director, Pacific Northwest Region, National Park Service.
